sentences.en: A new Catholic bishop was installed in Galway yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天在戈尔韦任命了一位新的天主教主教。

sentences.en: A prayer vigil is being held in the cathedral in memory of the bishop.
sentences.cn: 为了纪念这位主教，教堂里正在举行守夜祈祷。

sentences.en: Bishop Daly said he was devastated by news of the Cardinal's death.
sentences.cn: 戴利主教说他听到红衣主教去世的消息后感到极为震惊和难过。

sentences.en: Bishop Silvester officiated at the funeral.
sentences.cn: 西尔韦斯特主教主持了葬礼。

sentences.en: He resigned from his post as Bishop when the scandal broke.
sentences.cn: 丑闻传开后他辞去了主教职务。

sentences.en: He was a bishop who was held in reverence by all.
sentences.cn: 他是一位被大家都尊敬的主教.

sentences.en: I've heard a whisper that the Bishop intends to leave.
sentences.cn: 我听到有谣传说主教打算离开.

sentences.en: The Bishop directed the faithful to stay at home.
sentences.cn: 主教要求信徒们呆在家中。

sentences.en: The Bishop said he was sickened by the severity of the sentence.
sentences.cn: 主教说他对如此重的量刑大为震惊。

sentences.en: The move to Prague was a daunting prospect for the bishop.
sentences.cn: 对于主教来说，要迁往布拉格有点儿令人发憷。

sentences.en: The new church was consecrated by the Bishop.
sentences.cn: 新教堂的奉献仪式由主教主持.

sentences.en: There have been various wagers on certain candidates since the Bishop announced his retirement.
sentences.cn: 自从大主教宣布退职后，人们纷纷打赌猜测几位继任人选。

sentences.en: Two years after his death the bishop was canonised.
sentences.cn: 主教逝世两年后被正式封为圣者.

trans.tran_en: a priest with a high rank in some Christian religions, who is the head of all the churches and priests in a large area
